content:
IChapteredRowset Interface

In this Article

Provides an implementation of the OLE DB IAccessor interface for use by applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("0c733a93-2a1c-11ce-ade5-00aa0044773d")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown)]
public interface IChapteredRowset

Remarks

Note

Functions and objects in the Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6 namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the .NET Framework. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.

Methods summary

AddRefChapter(Int32,Int32)

Adds a reference count to an existing chapter.
ReleaseChapter(Int32,Int32)

Releases a chapter.

Methods

  • AddRefChapter(Int32,Int32)

    Adds a reference count to an existing chapter.

    public void AddRefChapter (int hChapter, out int cRefCount);

    Parameters

    • hChapter
      Int32

      The handle of the chapter for which to increment the reference count.

    • cRefCount
      Int32

      A pointer to memory in which to return the reference count of the chapter handle.

    Remarks

    Note

    Functions and objects in the Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6 namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the .NET Framework. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.

  • ReleaseChapter(Int32,Int32)

    Releases a chapter.

    public void ReleaseChapter (int hChapter, out int cRefCount);

    Parameters

    • hChapter
      Int32

      The chapter handle.

    • cRefCount
      Int32

      A pointer to memory in which to return the reference count of the chapter handle.

    Remarks

    Note

    Functions and objects in the Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6 namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the .NET Framework. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.
